Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3115 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-3115 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tensorboard is earlier than 2.16.2-1, affected by CVE-2021-3115
